title: Welcome to The Terraformer Community!
body: This is a place to discuss The Terraformer project, share ideas, and collaborate on infrastructure automation.
author: cywf

title: Best practices for Terraform modules?
body: I'm looking for advice on structuring Terraform modules for multi-cloud deployments. What approaches have worked well for you?
author: developer123

title: Feature Idea: Multi-region disaster recovery
body: It would be great to have built-in support for multi-region DR scenarios with automated failover.
author: cloudarchitect
